name: Stitchy Shadows
description:
Stitchy Shadows is a cute, voodoo-inspired puzzle game made during the GGJ 2022 with the theme duality.

--- It is intentional that you cannot see anything at the beginning ---

You play as a voodoo doll trying to regain it's lost limbs. But beware, the tower you are climbing is full of other dolls, and they too want to claim your appendages! They shadow your every step, so move smart. Otherwise, you might have to reclaim your limbs in a duel!

Move with WASD
